summary: draugr clothing rags dark/tan retexture for \'Draugr Rags Prison Replacer\' by tattooedillusions
descriptionHtml:
Draugr clothing rags dark/tan retexture for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28233]draugr Rags Prison Replacer [/url] by tattooedillusions.

[b]It will change the rags worn by female draugr too.[/b]

Theres a dark and a tan version.

Note:
This is a very quick and dirty recolor I did because i thought the vanilla white textures were hard to match with other clothing.
It doesnt improve the texture-quality, just changes the colors. Also if you step into a shadow, the specularity will turn it kind of bright, i dont know how to fix it -- whatever.
I\'ve no idea how it looks on draugr; didnt test that yet. The colors are fairly neutral though, so it probably doesnt make much difference.
author: yabo
